name: HttpResponse

methods.name: getBody
methods.description: Retrieves the body returned in the response.

methods.name: getBodyAsBlob
methods.description: Retrieves the body returned in the response as a Blob.

methods.name: getBodyDocument
methods.description: Retrieves the body returned in the response as a DOM document.

methods.name: getHeader
methods.description: Retrieves the contents of the response header.

methods.name: getHeaderKeys
methods.description: Retrieves an array of header keys returned in the response.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Retrieves the status message returned for the response.

methods.name: getStatusCode
methods.description: Retrieves the value of the status code returned in the response.

methods.name: getXmlStreamReader
methods.description: Returns an XmlStreamReader that parses the body of the callout response.

methods.name: setBody
methods.description: Specifies the body returned in the response.

methods.name: setBodyAsBlob
methods.description: Specifies the body returned in the response using a Blob.

methods.name: setHeader
methods.signature: public Void setHeader(String key, String value)
methods.description: Specifies the contents of the response header.

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Specifies the status message returned in the response.

methods.name: setStatusCode
methods.description: Specifies the value of the status code returned in the response.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns the status message and status code returned in the response, for example:

description: Use the HttpResponse class to handle the HTTP response returned by the Http class.
